title: New Canoo electric Pickup is a modular, accessory packed EV ready for vanlife adventure
content:
While the merits of electric vehicles still whip up heated debates in the comment sections, one thing is for sure: modular EV platforms like Canoo’s mean there’s so much room for activities. With the entire drivetrain, powerpack, and suspension packed into a skateboard-like deck, the Canoo platform leaves a ton of room for all kinds […]

The post New Canoo electric Pickup is a modular, accessory packed EV ready for vanlife adventure appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Zach Overholt
